title: HOW TO CHANGE ACCOUNT INFORMATION?
body: Hey guys, I've decided to go back to an old account and I need to change the email address and security questions etc as I haven't used the account in ages. Can someone please point me in the right direction?

replies.body: If you have access to the account (Meaning you know the login info and can login) do what BarryButcher said. If you can't access the account (Meaning you don't know the login info and can't login) then contact support (button on the top right near username).

do you know the password of the old account or old email?

if you can sign in the account, sign in with it on the forums and click on your username in the top right hand corner
ok thanks! what about security questions?
